data.message: I realize you must have put up the Thankful pretty flower icon for Mother's Day however was disappointed you took it away again we can use that all year. There are many people and things to be thankful for! Please bring it back!! Thank you. And we will be Thankful if you do! :)

replies.message: Hi Beth. Thanks for your input. If you have additional feedback on how we can improve Reactions on Facebook, please let us know: http://bit.ly/2qIwYK0. -Stephanie
SIMPLE:  Teach Your Children Well !!! Teach Faith, Love, happiness,hope, kindness,truth & a show a simple bright sunny day !!!  🤗
Loretta are you replying to me or FB?

Facebook Why did you remove the ability to see how many people "liked" a comment?
Quite overbearing...
